title: Just plat/diamond things amirite
body: Ok so i played a game with 1 silver 2 diamond and a plat in my team. this was a normal game. i called jg and no one said a word in champ select so i watched a vid. loading screen came and i saw that a plat player had went anivia with smite. he followed me through my jg clears and just trolled the entire game. What The Fuck. how are people not mature enough to just get over it and maybe i did steal her jg she didnt even say a word in champ select. ill have to edit this late4r and put a video but rly. is this how plat players act.... picks anivia jg follows u around and steal your camp and be a total dick about it cause u didnt get jg. what are u tyler 1? does anyone even report them? do they7 even get banned i mean even in silver elo nobody does that like cmon dude. thats so immature.  what are things i can do if things like this happen again?

replies.body:
Normals are where people try out stuff, so it's bound to happen. Could practice your jungle in a custom bots game. Give your team 3 beginner AI, give the opposition 5 Intermediate AI, and you're good to go. No trolling there.

P.S. If you don't win the game, need more practice.
